project_plan.name: Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that performs basic data analysis on CSV files, specifically calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for user-specified numerical columns.

task.name: Set up the project structure and dependencies
Implement functionality to read a CSV file
Implement function to calculate mean for specified numerical columns
Implement function to calculate median for specified numerical columns
Implement function to calculate mode for specified numerical columns
Write tests for each of the functions implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented functions to ensure accuracy of calculations
